Package com.fssa.librarymanagement.dao

Class BookDAO

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.librarymanagement.dao.BookDAO
public class BookDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling Book-related database operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    BookDAO()
    Constructs a new BookDAO object for performing database operations related to books.

  • Method Details

    • getBookByTitle

      public Book getBookByTitle (String bookName) throws DAOException
      Retrieves a book by its title.
      Parameters:
      bookName - The title of the book
      Returns:
      The Book object if found, otherwise null
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • doesBookExist

      public boolean doesBookExist (int bookId) throws DAOException
      Checks if a book with the given title exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The title of the book to check.
      Returns:
      true if a book with the specified title exists and meets certain criteria, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during the database operation.

    • createBook

      public boolean createBook (Book book) throws DAOException
      Creates a new book.
      Parameters:
      book - The Book object to be created
      Returns:
      true if the book is successfully created, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • getBookById

      public Book getBookById (int bookId) throws DAOException
      Retrieves a book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The ID of the book
      Returns:
      The Book object if found, otherwise null
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • getAllBooks

      public List<Book> getAllBooks() throws DAOException
      Retrieves a list of all active books.
      Returns:
      A list of Book objects
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • updateBook

      public boolean updateBook (Book book) throws DAOException
      Updates an existing book's information.
      Parameters:
      book - The Book object with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the book is successfully updated, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • updateBookCopies

      public boolean updateBookCopies (int bookId, int loanedCopyChange, int availableCopyChange) throws DAOException
      Updates the loaned and available copies of a book.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The ID of the book
      loanedCopyChange - The change in loaned copies counts (positive for increase, negative for decrease)
      availableCopyChange - The change in available copies counts (positive for increase, negative for decrease)
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • deleteBook

      public boolean deleteBook (int bookId) throws DAOException
      Marks a book as inactive (soft delete) by its title.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The title of the book to be marked as inactive
      Returns:
      true if the book is successfully marked as inactive, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation
